issue.title: released archives dos not contain arrow\cpp\submodules\parquet-testing\data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4441](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4441). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
as result tests depends on PARQUET_TEST_DATA are failed

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4441?focusedCommentId=16757732) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I see no benefit in bundling this data with releases. This aspect of testing the project is documented in the README

https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/cpp#parquet-development-notes

If you would like to discuss further, let's do that on the mailing list
